data: “Ain’t it appalling,” demanded Sabrina, the Show Girl, "ain’t it appalling the way the show game has gone to the morgue this season?
"Ain't it appalling," demanded Sabrina, the Show Girl, "ain't it appalling the way the show game has gone to the morgue this season?
